# Completing an Honors Project in Psychology at Brooklyn College of CUNY

This a resource for all things related to completing an honors thesis project in the Department of Psychology at Brooklyn College of the City University of New York

Use the resources on this page to [learn about an honors project](https://crumplab.github.io/honorsproject/forstudents.html), see [what the requirements are](https://crumplab.github.io/honorsproject/requirements.html), get [some tips on planning your thesis](https://crumplab.github.io/honorsproject/roadmap.html) and [see what is expected of the final project](https://crumplab.github.io/honorsproject/roadmap.html#structure_of_an_honors_project). Also, check out our [faculty web sites](http://www.brooklyn.cuny.edu/web/academics/schools/naturalsciences/undergraduate/psychology/faculty.php) to for a list of possible mentors

## News and Announcements

Registration for the Fall 2018 semester is already underway. If you plan on pursuing an honors thesis, then check out the resources on this page, and get registered.
